title: General Champion information or maybe not at all?
body:
Hey guys, after every new champion comes out from being 2 weeks on the PBE server that champion is released onto the live servers, but, when the patch is released to the live servers with the new champion they aren't playable for the first day or couple of days.

Why is this? Why wouldn't they just release the champion and give players access to him on patch release instead of 1-2 days after??

replies.body: To the best of my knowledge it's to make sure nothing in the new patch has broken the game before introducing a significant new element which also has that potential.
